Pre-Game Insights: Luka Modric will be crucial for the home team here.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia are unbeaten in their last four home matches
Poland have won just once in their last four matches
Croatia are unbeaten in their last three matches against Poland
Others: The match is scheduled to take place on September 8, 2024, at 7:45 PM UK.
Croatia will be without the services of Lovro Majer, Josip Stanisic, and Martin Erlic through injuries.
Poland have all the players available in their squad except for Arkadiusz Milik and Jakub Kiwior who are ruled out due to injury.
